column7: | {{Free|[[Debian Social Contract]] and [[Debian Free Software Guidelines|DFSG]]}} (main is 100% free non-free packages are optional)!--Debian consists of packages in the main repository which is completely free. The supplementary contrib repository consists of packages which are free but require components not hosted in main. The supplemental non-free repository is not free. While the Debian Operating System itself is free it is not endorsed by the FSF because the Debian Project hosts non-free software that can be installed optionally.[https://www.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/ch-archive.html] --
